Name: Retro School
About the game: Retro School is a VHS PSX multiplayer horror game where a group of children try to run and hide from evil teacher. When you join game its randomly choose a teacher. He need to catch all kids. Children need to escape from school and hide from teacher. Use your skills to win. Dont forget to add Retro School in wishlist! And join discord group -
